snippet.title: MindXcope - Official Gameplay Trailer | Upload VR Showcase Winter 2023
snippet.description: Watch hack-and-slash gameplay action in this trailer for MindXcope, an upcoming VR rogue-lite action game that's coming to Steam VR and Meta Quest. A public Alpha demo will be available in December 2023. In MindXcope, enter a bizarre world originates from people's daily struggles to embark on an unexpected adventure. Gain your weapons, hack and slash your way through scenes symbolizing your dilemmas, eliminate your nightmares and uncover the secrets.
